main event: A UFO report from Project Blue Book concerning an unidentified object sighting in Vermillion, Ohio on July 12, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed moving slowly and then disappearing without a trail., The witness described the object as bright white or silver and about 1/3 the length of a pencil at arm's length., The estimated speed of the object was reported to be around 1500 mph., The sighting occurred at nighttime and under clear sky conditions., The report was part of a structured questionnaire intended to gather detailed observational data on UFO sightings.
witness description: A 22-year-old male residing in Claveland, Ohio.
